knimeNode.name: DFM2PM Converter
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node-extension mines a process tree and Petri net from directly-follows model. We don't call it conversion, because the real discovery process happens here and directly-follows model is simply a summary of event log. * nInput is a DFM, output are a process tree and a Petri net

ports.outPort: Output a Petri net as a mined process model
Output a Process tree as a mined process model
